{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Asoka |model=PL9520-WAP |revision= |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/06/2002 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=NI3-2511CF |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=CompactFlash |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_cf_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Senao SL-2511CF |wi1_module_if=CompactFlash |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873B |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |flags=HomePlug 1.01 |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=PL9520-WAP |default_ssid_regex=^PL9520-WAP$ |default_ip=192.168.8.200 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F }} {{TagLine|PlugLink Wireless Access Point}} :[http://web.archive.org/web/20060201002109/http://www.asokausa.com/pdf/PL9520WAP_UserGuide.pdf Manual] (via archive.org)
This device is using a ''[[Senao]]'' wireless module. :The default HomePlug password is '''HomePlug'''.
*[http://www.cincinnaticomm.com/Data/Docs/Wireless%20Modem%20Guide_031406.pdf Appears to have been used with ''current broadband'']
